about_the_game:
DRAMATIC STORYLINE

Uncover a narrative that will captivate you until the very end. WILL: Follow The Light, crafted by the young indie studio TomorrowHead, is an adventure story game that strives to push the boundaries of the genre. An escapism-themed plot takes inspiration from the game Firewatch, while the visuals and atmosphere are influenced by Alan Wake. WILL: Follow The Light features unusual but intuitive game mechanics against an enthralling backdrop of epic northern scenery. You will find yourself sailing between remote islands and uncharted waters.

Learn more about your own nature while exploring a variety of meaningful locations, from the rugged Nordic shores to the icy and stormy northern sea. The plot is filled with puzzles and mysterious elements related to your relatives, drawing you in and keeping you eager to unveil the next layer of the story until harsh reality drags you back. WILL’s story revisits the timeless dilemma between fathers and sons and will thus reflect on you deeply. This emotional roller coaster will carry you through wild thunderstorms, the ringing silence of loneliness, and the importance of caring for your loved ones.

KEY FEATURES

Get ready to experience the thrill of managing a sailing yacht with realistic controls that were developed with input from actual voyagers’ stories, yet simplified for any player to enjoy. Navigating through cold and hostile environments has always been vital to northern people, and WILL, a fearless man who grew up on the sea, embodies this spirit of adventure.

Face challenges not only on the water, but also on land. Feel the endless contrast between two elements of nature as you take on the role of lightkeeper. To progress, you will solve puzzles rooted in real life, using an authentic weather station and lifelike navigation system. The beacon guides your way and illuminates your hopes.

Traverse treacherous, snowy trails with a dog sled and search for the answers. As you embark on this adventure, you will lose track of time, utterly transfixed by the mysterious ride.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-8100 or AMD Ryzen 5 2600X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 Super or AMD Radeon RX VEGA 56 or Intel Arc A750
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-10400 or AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3070 Ti or AMD Radeon RX 6750 XT or Intel Arc A770
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 30 GB available space

short_description: Dive into a realistic, single-player, first-person journey through the harsh northern latitudes as you sail endless waters, searching for a way back to your loved ones. Will you follow the light?

English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support
